member.name: M:AcronymMaker.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: This is the main driver method.

member.name: M:AcronymMaker.Program.Abbreviate(System.String)
member.summary: Method that will abbreviate the input and create an acronym.
member.param: The string to be converted into an acronym.
member.returns: The compressed string - basically the acronym.
